titleStmt.title: The Vertues of coffee set forth in the works of [brace] the Lord Bacon his Natural hist., Mr. Parkinson his Herbal, Sir George Sandys his Travails, James Howel Esq. his Epistles / collected and published for the satisfaction of the drinkers thereof.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

notesStmt.note: Item at 1590:3 incorrectly identified as Wing D72.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
